author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/50215

#### PR description:

From the master PR:

> Miscellaneous fixes to run `ScoutingEGammaCollectionMonitoring` more efficiently as part of the online DQM:
> - book and fill miniAOD electron plots only if `useOfflineObject` is true
> - adjust list of triggers to monitor (use the ones populating DQMOnlineScouting dataset)
> - (bonus) use `std::abs` instead of `fabs`

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests_TestDQMOnlineClient-scouting_dqm_sourceclient` runs fine.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/50215 to 16.0.X for 2026 data-taking
title: [16.0.X] Adapt `ScoutingEGammaCollectionMonitoring` to run in online DQM
